title: Synthesis, characterization, and evaluation of pyrimidinone-linked thiazoles: DFT analysis, molecular docking, corrosion inhibition, and bioactivity studies

Author(s): K.D. Venu prasad, Balakrishna Kallauraya, Ramesh S. Bhat, Subrahmanya I. Bhat, Vinuta Kamat, Mahesh Akki, Amit Kumar, K. Jyothi, B.R. Bharat
